keyword: how many calories in a hot dog bun
title: How Many Calories in a Hot Dog Bun?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a hot dog bun, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and variations for better meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in a Hot Dog Bun?
assumptions: Standard white hot dog bun, plain (no seeds or toppings), about 43 g, untoasted.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, ingredients (e.g., enriched vs. whole grain), and preparation. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard hot dog bun contains about 120 calories and 21 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a hot dog bun?
faqs.a: About 120 calories for a standard plain white hot dog bun.

faqs.q: Are hot dog buns high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 21 g of carbs per bun, mostly from refined flour.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a hot dog bun?
faqs.a: Around 210 mg per bun, which can add up with fillings.

faqs.q: Do hot dog buns have protein or fat?
faqs.a: About 4 g protein and 2 g fat per bun; low in both.

faqs.q: How do calories change with whole grain buns?
faqs.a: Slightly higher at ~130 kcal, with more fiber (2-3 g).
